note: Shown is the share replying "more than once a week", "once a week" or "once a month" when asked "Apart from weddings, funerals and christenings, about how often do you attend religious services these days?"
title: Share of people who attend religious services frequently
subtitle: Share of respondents who say that they attend religious services at least once a month, apart from weddings, funerals and christenings.

display.name: Share of people who attend religious services frequently
display.entityAnnotationsMap: United Kingdom: England, Scotland, and Wales
